mapper.select: select s.lcode, s.status, l.lname, to_char(l.start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') start_date, to_char(l.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end_date,num, l.teacher_name from students s, lesson l, (select max(rownum) num from students where lcode=#{lcode}) n where s.lcode=#{lcode} and l.lcode=#{lcode} and s.client_id=#{clientId}

select l.lname, to_char(l.start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') start_date, to_char(l.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end_date, s.cancel_date from students s, lesson l where l.lcode=#{lcode} and s.lcode=#{lcode} and s.client_id=#{clientId}
DELETE FROM LESSON_LIKE WHERE lcode=#{lcode} and client_ID=#{clientId}

select s.status, l.lname, to_char(l.start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') start_date, to_char(l.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end_date,num, l.teacher_name from students s, lesson l, (select max(rownum) num from students where lcode=#{lcode}) n where s.lcode=#{lcode} and l.lcode=#{lcode} and s.client_id=#{clientId} and s.status=#{pageStatus}
